articles.title: 'I felt alone in a room full of people': Kohli.. - Greatandhra
articles.description: Former India captain Virat Kohli said that the constant pressure and scrutiny can affect the mental health of a sportsperson negatively and has personally experienced it, adding he had felt alone, at times, despite being in a room full of people.
